Text: if you recorded the metallica gig at Live Earth...please uplode it!!!!! anyway thanks for this!!!

Why go to the effort of recording and editing this and then convert it into such a shit format? 

I hope someone seeds a real DVD version of this.

I didn't do any editing... Turned on TiVo, hit capture on a Hardware Divx encoder, and hit stop at the end. No post processing. If you download it, there is a little at the beginning and end with commercials (under 3 seconds)

And I don't think a DVD exists yet because they were recorded at concerts TODAY!!!

Anyone have suggestions on what you want, I am a little limited on bandwidth (about 20KB/s upload), so I won't release them all at once. Once it gets seeded by everyone, I can release another. Also, I need to finish capturing them all. I am a little behind right now...

We found another part of the LP performance that wasn't included in this torrent (performance of "Bleed It Out")...

I'm going to bed right now though. But tomorrow, I'll post a new torrent with the same first 4 parts, so all you who have already downloaded (or are downloading) this torrent can save to the same folder and just resume to get the 5th part.
